fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ritual (Day): Select a player to sacrifice, If they are pure-blooded (NB, Town, NC that can win with Town) they will die at the beginning of the night unless another day-targetter visits them.
- Summoning (Night): If the day ability was performed successfully, kill a target with an unstoppable attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect, Control, Roleblock immune.
- You have infinite uses. See? It's not Ritual Leader
